Galatea Information Strategies
They have two classes now available: Cocoon Fundamentals and Advanced Cocoon. Both courses are two days each and are offered in Denver, Colorado. It is also possible to arrange on-site training if there are sufficient participants.

S&N AG
S&N offers Cocoon training. Two courses are available - "Introducing Cocoon" (3 days) for beginners and "Unraveling Cocoon" for developers (2 days). The courses are available in English or German. It is also possible to arrange on-site training.

Anyware Technologies
Anyware Technologies offers Cocoon training in France. Course are organized in two classes (3 day introduction and 2 day advanced), but can be mixed with our other XML and Java training material to meet specific needs. Courses are held in French and can be on-site.

Orientation in Objects
You can learn how to develop web applications using Cocoon and XSPs in a three day training course. Courses will take place every 2 months in Mannheim, Germany. See course description. We also offer on-site training in English.

s1.title: How to get listed
s1.p: If you do not find your site here, make sure you tell us. Enter a meaningful title after the words "Link: Training:" in the subject, provide a short summary of your site, and do not forget to tell us the URL. You could also follow the Contributing page to make it easier for everyone.
